Trade/Device Name(s): artus® Infl A/B RG RT-PCR Kit
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for artus Infl A/B RG RT-PCR Kit for multiplex qualitative detection and differentiation of Influenza A and B viral RNA in nasopharyngeal swabs using real-time RT-PCR.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and identification of Influenza A and B virus RNA in nasopharyngeal swab specimens from symptomatic patients as an aid in differential diagnosis of respiratory tract infection, in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological risk factors; not intended to detect Influenza C virus.
